item.title: New Container: Orca Slicer
item.description: We have released a new container for Orca Slicer! Orca Slicer is an open source slicer for FDM printers. OrcaSlicer is fork of Bambu Studio, it was previously known as BambuStudio-SoftFever, Bambu Studio is forked from PrusaSlicer by Prusa Research, which is from Slic3r by Alessandro Ranellucci and the RepRap community
item.content:
We have released a new container for Orca Slicer!

Orca Slicer is an open source slicer for FDM printers. OrcaSlicer is fork of Bambu Studio, it was previously known as BambuStudio-SoftFever, Bambu Studio is forked from PrusaSlicer by Prusa Research, which is from Slic3r by Alessandro Ranellucci and the RepRap community
